title: 109_s2397
content: Long-Term Care Trust Account Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish tax-exempt long-term care trust accounts. (2) allow cash contributions to such accounts up to $5,000 annually. (3) allow an exclusion from gross income for certain distributions, including for long-term care services for chronically-ill individuals. (4) impose penalties for excess contributions to such accounts and for failure to provide required reports on such accounts. And (5) allow a refundable tax credit for 10 of the annual contributions to such accounts.
